name: Iron Crypticle
description: IRON CRYPTICLE is an arcade twin-stick dungeon shooter with RPG elements for 1 to 4 players LOCAL CO-OP! A mysterious, malevolent force has abducted Cryptonia’s princess – along with the king’s royal golden treasures (shaped curiously like large foodstuffs...). Kingsguard to the rescue!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Dual Core 2Ghz or above Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Open GL 2.0 Compatible Video Card (Intel HD4000 or better) Storage: 120 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Dual Core 2Ghz or above Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Open GL 2.0 Compatible Video Card (Intel HD4000 or better) Storage: 200 MB available space
